giveawayExtended.extendedHelp:
This command is designed to manage giveaways. You can start them with this command by giving it the time and a title.

When a giveaway has been created, I will send a giveaway message and react to it with ðŸŽ‰ so the members of the server can participate on it.

You can pass a flag of `--winners=Xw`, wherein X is a number (for example 2w for 2 winners) to allow multiple people to win a giveaway.
Please note that there is a maximum of 25 winners.
explainedUsage: The channel in which to start the giveaway, defaults to the channel the command was run at.
A list of roles separated by space members must have in order to participate, if any.
The time the giveaway should last.
The amount of winners, this takes an integer suffixed with `w`, e.g. `2w` for 2 winners.

giveawayRerollDescription: Re-roll the winners from a giveaway.

giveawayRerollExtended.extendedHelp: This command is designed to re-roll finished giveaways. Please check `Skyra, help gstart` for more information about creating one.
explainedUsage: The amount of winners to pick.
The ID or URL of the message to target. Defaults to last giveaway message.

giveawayScheduleDescription: Schedule a giveaway to start at a certain time.

usages: TextChannel Schedule Role1 Role2...RoleN Time Winners Title
TextChannel Schedule Role1 Role2...RoleN Time Title
giveawayScheduleExtended.extendedHelp:
This command prepares a giveaway to start at a certain time if you do not wish to start it immediately.
You can pass a flag of `--winners=Xw`, wherein X is a number, to allow multiple people to win this giveaway.
Please note that there is a maximum of 25 winners.
explainedUsage: The channel in which to start the giveaway, defaults to the channel the command was run at.
The time to wait before starting the giveaway.
A list of roles separated by space members must have in order to participate, if any. If both you are allowed to ping the specified role(s) then I will ping them as well.
The time the giveaway should last.
The amount of winners, this takes an integer suffixed with `w`, e.g. `2w` for 2 winners.
examples: #giveaways 20m @subscribers @patrons 10m 5w Flash giveaway! 5 lucky subscribers or patrons will win 1 month free Discord Nitro!
1h 2h 3w A month of Twitch subscription for 3 lucky winners!
#patreon-giveaways 40m @patrons 30m Get an exclusive chance to be in the next Saturday Discord Community stream!

giveawayRerollInvalid: The message ID does not exist or there is no finished giveaway.

explainedUsage: A channel and a message ID from it.
A message ID from this channel.
A link to a message in this server.

giveawayEndMessageNotMine: I am sorry, but that does not seem like a giveaway that is being run by me!
giveawayEndMessageNotActive: The message you have given me looks like it can be a giveaway, but I am not tracking it. If you want to re-roll a finished giveaway, please run `greroll`.
